at severe which means an attack is

decided at the end of the day yesterday
we should be raised to this higher level
of critical we've now given the

but at the moment the really important

that
I'm afraid I can't I mean the

did know about him and as I say we will

there are elements of this which have to

so people are reasonably wondering

our focus is always going to be or
making sure that we keep people safe
making sure they keep keep them safe
it's the best way to do that is to

let this level being raised to critical
mean in pure practical terms well one of

and equipment when they need it in order
to make sure that they can step up

and we want to make sure that everybody

so that people can carry on with their

stop our way of life we will make sure

the police have the support they need an

does that mean soldiers on our streets
how many and for how long
well it's it's it's up to 3,800 and it's

matter how long is very important I
would expect this to be temporary we
